thumb.title: quem comete latrocinio arderá mais no inferno
thumb.description: quem comete latrocinio arderá mais no infernobandido bom é bandido mortogeração raiz covarde e imunda vida a geração nutellalentamente um guisado para escapar de lentoSão Paulo wakes up with pain in its chest October 1st is just another way Dark streets without promise or faith The chicken thief reigns in reverse On the dark corner I see the danger Sharp looks, beggar's laughter Walking here is dancing with death The alleys are the end of our luck You don't know what it's like To walk without protection In your chest only faith The city is a volcano Six o'clock in the morning and I'm already alert Life goes on uncertainly always awake I look ahead but I see the past Memories of a time almost extinguished São Paulo is fire, it's an open wound Each street a deserted legend The march continues without direction or reason Each step is a risk without explanation You don't know what it's like To walk without protection In your chest only faith The city is a volcanosó defende bandido quem nunca foi vítima deles ou teve um familiar sob a mira de uma armaamor de mãe é estranho ela da a sua vida por ti mas põe macho dentro de casa pra ter risco dele abusar de você
